about_the_game:
Experience classic survival horror, now in 2D.


SYNOPSIS:

December 2019.

Get ready for a last night of work you'll never forget in "Coding Day: A true story"! After two and a half years of dedication, the release of your project is about to become a reality. But when dark secrets and sinister forces stand in your way, will you be able to survive the final delivery?

Explore a dark and mysterious office building as you fight to escape the entity that threatens to destroy everything you've worked so hard for. With loyal friends who will help you along the way, unexpected enemies, and terrifying creatures whose origins no one knows, you'll never know what awaits you around every corner.

Use your skills to solve challenging puzzles, hack security systems, and find valuable resources to stay alive. But be careful: every move you make could take you closer to darkness and madness. You only have one chance to make it out alive.

"Coding Day: A true story" will take you on a journey to the darkest depths of the world of video game development. Are you ready to face your fears and survive the most terrifying night of your life? Discover the truth behind the dark unknown and save your project before it's too late!

FEATURES:

  • Interact with a wide variety of characters who will help you progress in your challenge to complete the development of Fear the Dark Unknown.
  • Pick up all sorts of crazy objects to use in ways never seen before. The puzzles in this game can only be compared to the classics of the genre.
  • In Coding Day, anything can become a danger. Stress is the main problem for the protagonist, and you never know when you’ll get a call from your bank, when a crazy guy will scare you in the dark hallways, or when your freelance fees will go up.
  • Don't let stress get the best of you and ruin years of development. Eat everything you find to relieve your stress, but remember: Fast food has consequences.
  • Be sure to read all the documents you find. You never know which one will help you solve that puzzle you’re stuck on, or it might just help you get to know the disturbed characters of Coding Day better.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GS, Radeon HD4000
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In "Coding Day", you are a videogame developer whose project is about to be released, but a sinister entity threatens its publication, and you must survive it throughout the night in a dark office building full of mysteries and dangers.
supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Spain, Italian, German, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal
